title: Employment end date
p1: Tell us when you finished with the respondent.

endDate.required: Tell us your Employment end date. For example, DD MM YYYY
endDate.invalidDateInFuture: Enter a valid end date, date must be in the past
endDate.invalidDateMoreThanTenYearsInPast: Enter a valid end date, date must not be more than 10 years in the past
endDate.dayRequired: Enter a day for your end date. For example, 23
endDate.monthRequired: Enter a month for your end date. For example, 04
endDate.yearRequired: Enter the year for your end date. For example, 2022
endDate.dayNotANumber: Day must only contain numbers. For example, 23
endDate.monthNotANumber: Month must only contain numbers. For example, 04
endDate.yearNotANumber: Year must only contain numbers. For example, 2022
endDate.invalidDate: Employment end date must be a real date.
